actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 901 of title 38 of the United States Code to require the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide two sizes of flags for burial purposes and to permit next of kin of deceased veterans to select the size desired.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide two sizes of flags for burial purposes and to permit the next of kin of deceased veterans to select the size desired.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 901 of title 38 of the United States Code to require the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide two sizes of flags for burial purposes and to permit next of kin of deceased veterans to select the size desired.
